name: Colonel Harland Sanders
description: Founder of Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC), turned a simple fried chicken recipe into a global fast-food empire.

name: Ray Kroc
description: Expanded McDonald's from a small chain into the world's largest fast-food franchise.

name: Dave Thomas
description: Founder of Wendy’s, known for fresh, square beef patties and innovative marketing.

name: Travis Kalanick
description: Before Uber, he co-founded Red Swoosh and Scour.net; disrupted the food delivery industry with Uber Eats.

name: Elon Musk
description: CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, also founded X.com (which became PayPal); leading innovator in tech and AI.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
description: Founder of Facebook (Meta), revolutionized global social networking and virtual reality ecosystems.

name: Satya Nadella
description: CEO of Microsoft, led its shift to cloud computing and revitalized the company’s growth.

name: Sundar Pichai
description: CEO of Google and Alphabet, known for advancing Chrome, Android, and Google Cloud technologies.

name: Henry Ford
description: Founder of Ford Motor Company, revolutionized the auto industry with mass production and the Model T.

name: Enzo Ferrari
description: Founder of Ferrari, an iconic brand known for luxury sports cars and racing excellence.

name: Soichiro Honda
description: Founded Honda Motor Co., expanding from motorcycles to cars and robotics worldwide.

name: Frederick W. Smith
description: Founder of FedEx, revolutionized the global logistics and express shipping industry.
